products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, bold, scarlet red roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their luscious splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash scarlet red is a firey vertical blindslat - perfect for adding a bold, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this red fabric is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Scarlett
products.description: Splash scarlett made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash scarlet red is a bright and bold red perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous red blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.
